abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Yeenoghu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, spiritual weapon (8th-level spell, 4d8 + 2 force damage on a hit, appears as a flail)
3/day each: dispel magic, fear, invisibility
1/day: teleport

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Rampage.
abilities.description: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.
